p:
Other researchers have posited additional potential mechanisms for COVID-related neuroinflammation including cytokine network dysregulation, peripheral immune cell transmigration and a post infection aberrant autoimmune response.
9 ] Two of the four patients in this report had Alzheimer's disease (AD) and neuroinflammation is increasingly being recognized as an important factor in the progression of AD
16
,
17 and may link late life depression, mild cognitive impairment, and AD.
18
